code: import axios from"axios";var api=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:5005"});var signUp=function signUp(_ref){var username=_ref.username,password=_ref.password,email=_ref.email;return api.post("/auth/signup",{username:username,password:password,email:email}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};var logIn=function logIn(_ref2){var username=_ref2.username,password=_ref2.password;return api.post("/auth/login",{username:username,password:password}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};var verifyToken=function verifyToken(storedToken){return api.get("/auth/verify",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(storedToken)}}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};var uploadPhoto=function uploadPhoto(uploadData){return api.post("/api/upload",uploadData).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(){var storedToken=localStorage.getItem('authToken');return api.get("/api/users",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(storedToken)}}).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.error(err);});};var editUser=function editUser(_ref3){var username=_ref3.username,campus=_ref3.campus,course=_ref3.course,image=_ref3.image;return api.put("/api/users",{username:username,campus:campus,course:course,image:image});};var authMethods={signUp:signUp,logIn:logIn,verifyToken:verifyToken,uploadPhoto:uploadPhoto,getCurrentUser:getCurrentUser,editUser:editUser};export default authMethods;
